com.anthem.selenium.utils

Class DatabaseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anthem.selenium.utils.DatabaseUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseConstants

    public class DatabaseUtils
extends Object
implements DatabaseConstants
    This class provides the methods for handling basic database functionality.
    To use the methods from this Utility, make sure to have required JDBC Driver jar file in class path.
    Author:
    shiva.katula

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getDBConnectionURLFormat

        public static String getDBConnectionURLFormat(int databaseName)
        This method returns Database URL Format for example purposes.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - Database Type Use DatabaseConstants.Database_ for different kinds of databases.
        Returns:
        database Connection URL Format
        See Also:
        DatabaseConstants

      • getConnection

        public static Connection getConnection(int databaseName,
                                       String dbConnUrl)
        This method returns Database Connection.
        Default Drivers configured are H2DB, ORACLE, MYSQL, MSSQL, DB2, PostgreSQL, Sybase, JavaDB (Apache Derby), SQLLite, Teradata.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - Database Type Use DatabaseConstants.Database_ for different kinds of databases.
        dbConnUrl - Full DB Connection URL (including user id and password) of respective Database.
        Returns:
        Connection

      • getConnection

        public static Connection getConnection(String dbDriverClass,
                                       String dbConnUrl)
        This generic method returns Database Connection with requested JDBC Driver class.
        Parameters:
        dbDriverClass - Database specific JDBC Driver class to be used, should be in classpath.
        dbConnUrl - Full DB Connection URL (including user id and password) of respective Database.
        Returns:
        Connection

      • executeQuery

        public static ResultSet executeQuery(Connection conn,
                                     String sqlQuery)
        This method will return ResultSet for a SELECT Query.
        Parameters:
        conn - Database Connection Object already created/Opened.
        sqlQuery - SQL Query to be executed
        Returns:
        ResultSet

      • executeQuery

        public static ResultSet executeQuery(Connection conn,
                                     String sqlQuery,
                                     Map<String,String> valuesMap)
        This method will return ResultSet for a SELECT Query. This supports the parameterized Query String. 
         Usage : - 
        
 String templateQuery = "SELECT * FROM  TABLE_NAME WHERE ID = ${ID}";
 Map valuesMap = new HashMap();
 valuesMap.put("ID", "1");
 ResultSet rs = DatabaseUtils.executeQuery(con, templateQuery, valuesMap);
        Parameters:
        conn - Database Connection Object already created/Opened.
        sqlQuery - SQL Query to be executed - can have place holders.
        valuesMap - Map of key and values.
        Returns:
        ResultSet

      • executeUpdateQuery

        public static Integer executeUpdateQuery(int databaseName,
                                         String dbConnUrl,
                                         String sqlQuery)
        This method will return count of the rows affected by the Query.
        This method can used for UPDATE, DELETE, INSERT Query.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - Database Type Use DatabaseConstants.Database_ for different kinds of databases.
        dbConnUrl - DB Connection URL of respective Database.
        sqlQuery - SQL Query to be executed
        Returns:
        Integer

      • executeUpdateQuery

        public static Integer executeUpdateQuery(String dbDriverClass,
                                         String dbConnUrl,
                                         String sqlQuery)
        This method will return count of the rows affected by the Query.
        This method can used for UPDATE, DELETE, INSERT Query.
        Parameters:
        dbDriverClass - Database specific JDBC Driver class to be used, should be in classpath.
        dbConnUrl - DB Connection URL of respective Database.
        sqlQuery - SQL Query to be executed
        Returns:
        Integer

      • executeUpdateQuery

        public static Integer executeUpdateQuery(Connection conn,
                                         String sqlQuery)
        This method will return count of the rows affected by the Query.
        This method can used for UPDATE, DELETE, INSERT Query.
        Parameters:
        conn - Database Connection Object already created/Opened.
        sqlQuery - SQL Query to be executed
        Returns:
        Integer

      • executeUpdateQuery

        public static Integer executeUpdateQuery(PreparedStatement pStmt)
        This method will return count of the rows affected by the Query.
        This method can used for UPDATE, DELETE, INSERT Query. This method takes PreparedStatement with all parameters embeded using JDBC Concept. 
         Usage: - 
        
        Connection con = DatabaseUtils.getConnection(DatabaseConstants.Database_H2DB, dbConnUrl,props);
  PreparedStatement pstmt = con.prepareStatement("UPDATE Table_Name SET STATUS = ? WHERE ID = ?");
  pstmt.setString(1,"Value");   
  pstmt.setInt(2, 1);
  DatabaseUtils.executeUpdateQuery(pstmt);
        Parameters:
        pStmt - PreparedStatement, SQL Query to be executed
        Returns:
        Integer

      • executeStoredProcedure

        public static ResultSet executeStoredProcedure(Connection conn,
                                               String storedProcName)
        This method will return ResultSet by executing the Store Procedure.
        This method does not support input/Output Parameters Only Pass Stored Procedure name eg:- sp_getUsers().
        Parameters:
        conn - Database Connection Object already created/Opened.
        storedProcName - Stored Procedure to be executed
        Returns:
        ResultSet

      • executeStoredProcedure

        public static CallableStatement executeStoredProcedure(Connection conn,
                                                       CallableStatement cstmt)
        This method will return CallableStatement by executing the Store Procedure.
        This method support input/Output Parameters already set to Callable statement and returns Callable Statement back so as to retrieve results back.
        Parameters:
        conn - Database Connection Object already created/Opened.
        cstmt - Callable Statement to be executed
        Returns:
        CallableStatement for retrieving any Out Params

      • executeStoredProcedure

        public static CallableStatement executeStoredProcedure(Connection conn,
                                                       String storedProcName,
                                                       Map<String,?> inOutParamsValueMap)
        This method will return CallableStatement by executing the Store Procedure.
        This method support input/Output Parameters already set. Only Pass Stored Procedure name eg:- sp_getUsers(?,?,?). For Setting Input - I#Number#DataType,Value eg:- inOutParamsValueMap.put(I#1#String,"Coffee")
        For Setting Output - O#Number#DataType,null eg:- inOutParamsValueMap.put(O#2#String,null)
        I/O (First Character) represents Input/Output.
        Number specifies the Stored Proc Parameter Number starting from 1.
        DataType Listed in DatabaseConstants.Type_* are supported
        Parameters:
        conn - Database Connection Object already created/Opened.
        storedProcName - Stored Procedure to be executed eg:- sp_getUsers(?,?,?).
        inOutParamsValueMap - Input and output Params List with DataTypes
        Returns:
        CallableStatement for retrieving any Out Params

                               String tableName,
                               String column)
        This method validates if the column is present in the table
        Parameters:
        conn - Database Connection
